comment: The determinant of a submatrix of a square matrix obtained by removing a row and a column at the same index equals the determinant of the original matrix with the row replaced with 0's and a 1 at the diagonal position. (Contributed by AV, 31-Jan-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 24-Jul-2019.)
